core.applicationservice.gameservices

Class GameStateManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.applicationservice.gameservices.GameStateManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GameStateManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    by this class we can save and load our game, and keep game state for loading the game and continuing the game we save the game status as a serialized object
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Team5
